description:
Nanoha and Yuuno are brought aboard the Administrative Bureau`s ship, Arthra. Lindy, the captain of the ship, reveals the truth about the Jewel Seeds and their capabilities. The Administrative Bureau takes over the problem of the Jewel Seeds and Nanoha and Yuuno`s response is...?
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Sore wa Ooi Naru Kiki na no?
それは大いなる危機なの?
